title: MPLP Trace Module – Core Protocol v1.0
description: Trace Module Core Protocol: Describes the minimal required semantics (Core Profile) for execution trace resources (Trace) and their key segments and events.

governance.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Governance metadata for lifecycle management, truth domain authority, and locking status.

lifecyclePhase.description: Current phase in the lifecycle fence (e.g., 'design', 'implementation', 'review').

truthDomain.description: The truth domain this object belongs to (e.g., 'requirements', 'architecture').

locked.description: If true, this object cannot be modified except by specific governance overrides.

lastConfirmRef.description: Reference to the last Confirm decision that validated this state.

trace_id.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Global unique identifier for the Trace.

context_id.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Identifier of the Context this Trace belongs to.

plan_id.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Identifier of the Plan associated with this Trace (if any).

root_span.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Root span definition of the Trace (follows L1 trace-base structure).

finished_at.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Trace finish time (ISO 8601, optional if not finished).

segments.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Key execution segments in the Trace (can correspond to multiple spans or phased aggregations).

events.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] List of events directly related to this Trace (errors, retries, status changes, etc.).

attributes.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Key context attributes related to this segment (key-value form, for tracing and audit).
